## 

The SPI is calculated as follows:

$$ SPI_t = 1-\frac{\sum_{s = 1}^{N}Wc_{(t,s)}}{W_{NP}*N} $$

Where Wc~(t,s)~ is the weight of protection category c for species s at time t, W~NP~ is the weight of the Not Protected Category, and N is the total number of species in the assessment.
